真的好玩，这用说吗？游戏的乐趣，和朋友的配合，以及各种嘲讽（当然，包括电脑给我两挑拨离间），增进朋友间的情谊。最主要还是要看脑子好不好使，哈哈。我已经推荐给我的好多朋友了。

It so much fun to try and figure out these puzzles in first person view and jumps around and stuff and portals are just cool. I also love how I can play this gam ewith my friend as seperate missions from single player.

This game is is amazing. If you've never played a portal game then play Portal 1's Demo.If you liked itbuy  Portal 1 and 2. With Portal  you either love it or hate it. Portal is a first person puzzle game where you use a Portal Gun to solve numerous tests while at the mercy of a super intelligent AI. The graphics are great and so is the voice acting. I recommed you to buy this game if this kind of game interests you. I give a 10/10

Portal 2 – одно из величайших достижений студии Valve!

Игра является головоломкой от первого лица. В ней нужно решать множество задач с помощью всего двух порталов (вход и выход).

This game is simply beautyful!
I really loved the story, It was intense and involving.
Characters's personality is charming and when it changes, it just blow you're mind up and exite you'r curiosity about what is going to happen next; that makes the game seems interactive.
After all this, the levels are really into the game and they make you love the portal gun.

Perfectly directed, lovely game!

Ganz klare Kaufempfehlung!

Wenn man ein Spiel mit einer tollen Geschichte, mit lustigen Sprüchen, mit fordernden Rätseln und mit einer der besten Bösewichte der Spielgeschichte sucht ist bei Portal 2 am besten aufgehoben!

I really recommend it.

Sin duda, uno de los mejores juegos de todos los tiempos. Tiene dos historias, singleplayer y multiplayer. Las cámaras hechas por otros usuarios (o uno mismo), hacen que la diversión nunca acabe.

This is a really good game for those who like to challenge themselves with tough puzzles and strategy games. I would say that Portal 2 is in tie with Undertale for best challenge puzzles as for me.

There's a lot of fun in the puzzle, like you getting crushed by the doors by mistake and you laugh about it. Or you just simply walk off the edge and fall into water. Either way, it's still pretty funny.

This would be a great game for those who like to do "WEE" or "AHHH" as they play the game.

Portal 2 has all what Portal has and more.

Portal lacks in plot. Portal 2 doesn't.
Portal has an addicting gameplay. Portal 2 has an even more.
Portal is a great game. Portal 2 is even better.
From playing this for the first time on Xbox 360, it is an incredible story driven adventure with challenging yet fun puzzles, and a satisfying ending. 10/10

Ursprünglich gut aber seit kurzem ist ein sehr großer Grafik fehler aufgetaucht und das Spiel stürzt am Laufenden Band ab. 
Es ist ein gutes Spiel also hoffe ich das diese fehler behoben werden. (wurden Behoben)
Ich empfehle dieses Spiel.

Dit spel is best, Vaag, Toen ik het speelde kreeg ik barstende kop pijn, Omdat ik er geen zak van snap, Ik kreeg stress, Werd nerveus, En ik was nog maar bij het begin van de spel info,

Kort om koop dit spel, Als je ziek wil worden van school, { Je krijgt 100% KOP pijn] En je word ziek] En ik ben nu depresief......

the portal games were the first steam games i found and are the reason i downloaded steam in the first place, if i never foind portal i may have never found the other remarkable games i have like tf2, cuphead and l4d2. The purpose of getting into an entire adventure and saving the apperture facility only with a gun that does not even shoot bullets deserves credit. Maybe the price is higher now but it will all and always be worth it as an unending pass time. thanks to the perpetual testing initiative this game can live on maybe for ever, i recommend any generations, i believe that this game was a step to gaming history and should live on for many years and decades to enjoy, glad i was part of the people who can make this masterpiece live.
It's nice.
AWESOME GAME!!!!

[b] Portal 2 - Первая игры от Valve, после прохождения которой ты получаешь дополнительную хромосому! [/b]

[h1] Сюжет[/h1]
[u] Внимание! Спойлеры! [/u]
[spoiler] События происходят спустя долгое время после первой части (предпологается 999999 месяцев),
когда во всей лаборотории остаётся всего один испытуемый. Этот последний испытуемый - немая девушка Челл, главная героиня первой части Portal. После пробуждения к нам стучится модуль Уитли (от англ. Wheatly) и помогает нам сбежать из разрушаемого комплекса. После долгих попыток запустить спасательную капсулу Уитли случайно включает ГЛаДОС (иногда её называют ГЛэДОС), которая настойчиво не выпускает Челл наружу. После долгого прохождения испытаний Челл и Уитли удаётся проникнуть в убежеще ГЛаДОС, где Челл заменяет модуль ГЛаДОС на Уитли. Однако после успешной замены модуля Уитли передумал отпускать нашу героиню... [/spoiler]
Coming soon...

If real bad
It is not scored more than 9 out of 10.

ถ้าไม่ดีจริง
ก็คงจะไม่ได้คะแนนมากว่า 9 เต็ม 10

Vsetko to z prveho Portalu, co bolo mozne vylepsit, vylepsene bolo. Vsetko co sa este pri zachovani povodneho konceptu pridat dalo, pridane bolo. To, co uz pridat a vylepsit neslo, tak pridali a vylepsili!
Pokracovanie Portalu je s definitivnym verdiktom najlepsia logicka hra sucasnosti. Dokonca si dovolim tvrdit, ze aj zaroven ta najvtipnejsia. Druhy Portal som dohral uz druhy krat a druhy krat sa opat presvedcil, ze vo svojom zanri proste nema konkurenciu. 

Priblble hlasky este priblblejsieho Wheatleyho, ci nekonecna vrazedna vypocitavost nadmieru inteligentnej GLaDOS vas musia dostat. Ak nie tie, tak potom urcite poskodena vezicka cestujuca po dopravnom pase niekam do spalovne, ktora si jemnym roztrasenym hlaskom sama pre seba vravi - "som ina". Ak vas ani toto neoslovi, tak zrejme nemate spravne naladeny zmysel pre humor. Je dokonca mozne, ze v takom pripade nemate ani srdce a s najvacsou pravdepodobnostou ste robot.

Portal 2 remains one of the most unique and intelligent games until this very day.Attractive gameplay,funny dialogue and memorable characters,Portal 2 is surely one of the best experiences you could have by playing a video game.
We are not speaking about a simple puzzle game that you play just to pass time,but one of the smartest game you could buy (for a very reasonable price).It has a lot of improvements since the first game and a new game mode,CO-OP,and really knows how to tell you a great story.
One of the most important things in this game is that it is never repetetive and it always keeps your mind busy.

This is not just a great game.This is a must-play,

(If you buy the game,be sure to download the soundtrack too,you are not going to regret it.)

~9.6/10.

Un bon, jeu, suite d'un autre bon jeu mais avec une bien meilleure durée de vie et de jolis graphismes! L'histoire est forcément bonne, le mode de jeu principal prendra quelques heures et il y a d'autres modes.
Les musiques sont bonnes, le gameplay aussi et les sons pareil.
Bref, je dis oui!

If I could rate this game one million thumbs up, I would. Probably the GREATEST puzzle game i've pleyed in a long time. And man, with mods like Aperature Tag: The Paint Gun Testing Inituative, this is some of Valve's best work, even 5 years after it came out. Great job, GLaDOS. :steamhappy:

The best puzzle game I have ever played or seen.

+ longer singleplayer that portal 1 had
+ genious voiceacting (campaigns)
+ fun coop mode!
+ near limitless amounts of workshop maps
+ map editor included and very easy to pick up
+ suits casual players just like hardcore gamers as long as you are into puzzles

- I have had quite a few game crashes, but you dont lose much progression (editor auto-saves, too)

I'm not into the x/10 thing but I can honestly recommend this game.
Игра очень интересная
Das Spiel ist Toll, vor allem der Multiplayer. (Wenn man einen schlauen Koop-Partner hat-.-)
Сломайте мозг!

So much effort went into making a great story for the game and it shows. This is one of the many reasons why a campaign in games can add so much to a game. There are so much funny writing and dialogue to be heard and seen in this game, even in the coop section. A must buy.

If you want to play coop, play it with a friend you know very well. And for the love of god, use voice chat. For the sake of you and your friend.

A great game, that is even harder than portal 1! It has a fascinating story line, and the graphics are great, especially compared to Portal 1.
Only get it if you have completed Portal 1 though - Or you won't understand it, and you will find the puzzles hard.

Interesting puzzle game with amazing storyline. Dive in the story and hear what does it want to tell you. Lovely psycological twist.

In a unique concept, Portal 2 has evolved from the original; the sequal adds a different feel from the first-- adding a dark undertone, that was total opposite of the first.  I highly recomend this game.
